thread.title: Burns & McDonnell hires project controls specialist
thread.title_full: Burns & McDonnell hires project controls specialist

author: Brian Johnson
title: Burns & McDonnell hires project controls specialist
text:
Home / Brief / Burns & McDonnell hires project controls specialist Burns & McDonnell hires project controls specialist By: Brian Johnson August 25, 2015 5:14 pm 0 
Burns & McDonnell has hired Marina Bebus as a project controls specialist with the Kansas City-based company’s new commercial construction design-build division in the Twin Cities. 
Bebus has seven years of experience in the architectural, engineering and construction industry. She will support projects across a number of key markets, including aviation, architecture and facilities design, business consulting, environmental remediation, solid waste management and more, according to Burns & McDonnell. 
“Our clients are excited to have Burns & McDonnell significantly increase our commercial construction design-build services in Minnesota and Upper Midwest because it gives them greater access to our skilled project teams,” Gene Sieve, office manager of Burns & McDonnell’s local office, said in a press release. “The new construction design-build division is a critical piece of our expansion plan as we support the growth of commercial construction projects in our region. We couldn’t be happier to have an exceptional talent like Marina create amazing successes for clients.” 
Bebus earned a bachelor’s degree in financial management from California State University. Share this:
